column1: The Purple Pig////People are very into this place! First few attempts to eat here didn't fly
column2: not waiting 2 hours sorry. This time I came with 1 friend at 3pm and we only waited briefly to sit at a shared table (space was tight but fine). Service from Corey was fabulous
column3: great suggestions! The rockstar dish to me was the grilled broccoli
column4: so much flavor. Got a great bottle of red wine from the Douro region of Portugal at a very reasonable price! The pork was great. Pass on the whipped feta. Overall very good food
column5: but over hyped for sure so don't wait hours to eat here. Don't skip the broccoli if you get a table here!
